name: Currents
description:
NB: The web version of the game is not the optimal experience, I recommend downloading the game and playing it that way.

Draw water currents with left-click-and-drag from an edge of the screen to another edge

Draw wind currents with right-click-and-drag from an edge of the screen to another edge

Press Space to switch from Edit to Play mode
In Play mode, Islands spit out tiny ships. If you hover your mouse over an island, it'll point to the destination its ships want to reach.   Get them there using currents and winds to win

(You can also delete currents by left clicking on them, and winds by right clicking on them)

(You can also reset all the paths (in edit mode) with R

Known bugs

Some of the key elements (permanent currents and permanent winds) are not loaded.
